comment.author: 14775694@N04
comment._content: The person on the left is probably wearing officers shoulder insignias.

comment.author: 22823123@N02
comment._content: Having a sash across the chest and shoulder indicated the officer of the day.  He is an officer,  Not the officers belt and sword not to mention the private purchase style bugle on his hat, no found too often on enlisted men.  Great Image.
